evidence_in_dialogue: [[Grissom]] well, one loose screw ... could n't cause a train to derail, could it?
[[Grissom]] possibly killed by that wrench and stuffed in his own trunk
[[Warrick]] The tip of the shovel glows with the presence of blood.
[[Grissom]] possibly killed by that wrench and stuffed in his own trunk
[[Sara]] they're a match to prints that we lifted off of jim nevins' t-bird and the wrench that was used to kill him
